entry.def: An outcast is someone who is not accepted by a group of people or by society.

example.ex: He had always been an outcast, unwanted and alone...
example.tran: 他一直都被视为异类，无人理睬，形单影只。

example.ex: All of us felt like social outcasts.
example.tran: 我们都觉得自己像是社会的弃儿。

means.word_mean: 1. a person who is rejected (from society or home)
